title: Spaghetti Bolognese
steps: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
Heat olive oil in a large pan and sauté the onion and garlic until softened.
Add the minced beef and cook until browned.
Stir in the canned tomatoes, tomato paste, and oregano.
Simmer for 20 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
Serve the sauce over the cooked spaghetti.

title: Chicken Curry
steps: Heat the oil in a large pan and sauté the onion and garlic until fragrant.
Add the diced chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in the curry powder and ground ginger.
Pour in the coconut milk and simmer for 15-20 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper. Serve with rice.

title: Pancakes
steps: In a bowl, mix the dry ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk together the egg, milk, and melted butter.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
Heat a pan over medium heat and pour 1/4 cup of batter for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook the other side until golden brown.

title: Beef Tacos
steps: Cook the ground beef in a skillet over medium heat until browned.
Add taco seasoning and water according to the packet instructions.
Simmer until thickened.
Serve the beef in taco shells with lettuce, cheese, sour cream, and salsa.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
steps: Butter one side of each slice of bread.
Place a slice of cheese between the unbuttered sides of the bread.
Heat a skillet over medium heat and cook the sandwich until golden brown on each side.

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
steps: In a large bowl, combine lettuce, Parmesan, and croutons.
Top with grilled chicken slices.
Drizzle Caesar dressing over the salad and toss before serving.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
steps: Heat sesame oil in a pan over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and ginger, cook until fragrant.
Add sliced vegetables and stir-fry until tender.
Stir in soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes before serving.

title: Margarita Pizza
steps: Preheat the oven to 220°C (425°F).
Roll out the pizza dough on a baking sheet.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough.
Top with mozzarella slices and drizzle with olive oil.
Bake for 12-15 minutes, until crust is golden.
Top with fresh basil leaves before serving.

title: Banana Smoothie
steps: Place all ingredients in a blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Serve immediately.

title: Omelette
steps: Beat eggs and milk in a bowl.
Melt butter in a pan over medium heat.
Pour the egg mixture into the pan.
Add bell peppers, ham, and cheese to one side of the omelette.
Fold the omelette in half and cook until fully set.

title: Tomato Soup
steps: Heat olive oil in a pot over medium heat.
Add onion and garlic, cook until softened.
Stir in crushed tomatoes and vegetable broth.
Simmer for 20 minutes, then blend until smooth.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

title: Baked Salmon
steps: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with dill, salt, and pepper.
Top with lemon slices and bake for 12-15 minutes.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cream together butter and sugars in a bowl.
Beat in egg and vanilla.
In another bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually add dry ingredients to the wet mixture.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

title: Guacamole
steps: Mash the avocados in a bowl.
Stir in lime juice, onion, and tomato.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve with tortilla chips.

title: Chicken Alfredo
steps: Cook the fettuccine pasta according to the package instructions.
In a pan, melt butter and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add chicken slices and cook until browned.
Pour in heavy cream and bring to a simmer.
Stir in Parmesan cheese until melted.
Combine the sauce with the cooked pasta and serve.

title: BBQ Chicken Wings
steps: Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F).
Toss the chicken wings with olive oil, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Arrange on a baking sheet and bake for 25-30 minutes.
Brush with BBQ sauce and bake for another 5 minutes.

title: Fried Rice
steps: Heat sesame oil in a pan and scramble the eggs.
Add diced carrots and peas, cook until softened.
Stir in the cooked rice and soy sauce.
Toss with green onions before serving.

title: French Toast
steps: Beat eggs, milk, and cinnamon in a bowl.
Dip each slice of bread in the mixture, coating both sides.
Melt butter in a skillet and cook the bread until golden brown on both sides.

title: Chili Con Carne
steps: Cook the ground beef and onion in a pot until browned.
Stir in chili powder, cumin, diced tomatoes, and kidney beans.
Simmer for 30 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

title: Garlic Bread
steps: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Mix butter, garlic, and parsley in a bowl.
Slice the bread and spread the butter mixture on each slice.
Bake for 10 minutes until golden and crispy.

title: Caprese Salad
steps: Arrange alternating slices of tomato and mozzarella on a plate.
Top with fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar before serving.

title: Lemon Bars
steps: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Mix flour, softened butter, and 1/4 cup sugar to form a crust.
Press into a baking dish and bake for 15 minutes.
In a bowl, whisk eggs, lemon juice, sugar, and baking powder.
Pour the lemon mixture over the crust and bake for another 20 minutes.

title: Greek Salad
steps: In a large bowl, combine cucumber, tomatoes, onion, olives, and feta.
Drizzle with olive oil and red wine vinegar.
Toss and serve.
